title: Farla Medical MediHands Disposable Extra Large Nitrile Gloves - Powder Free and Latex Free Surgical Gloves - Multi-Purpose, Single Use Medical Gloves - Box of 100, Black
features: Multi-Industry Use – MediHands nitrile disposable gloves were designed with multi industry use in mind. These are perfect for Tattooists, Mechanics, Hospitality, and countless other industries where protective gloves must be worn.
Latex Free – These nitrile gloves are made from latex-free material. Most cases of adverse skin reactions are triggered by a protein in latex and can develop over time through sustained use.

Powder Free – By using a chemical method of smoothing the inside of our gloves, we keep them easy to wear without using powder. The powder commonly found in other rubber gloves can be a cause of contamination in sensitive environments, all MediHands gloves are powder free.

Ambidextrous & Beaded Cuff – Each glove you find in a pack will be identical, so you can wear them on either hand. The beaded cuff offers drip protection for the forearm and increased glove strength, these are a feature on all MediHands gloves.
Durable – Made to be puncture resistant, MediHands black nitrile gloves maintain a tough barrier between possible impurities and your hands.
description: Product Description About Us Farla Medical Healthcare is a Leading UK Based Supplier of High Quality Medical Equipment, Single Use Instruments, Procedure packs and Pharmaceuticals to the Primary Care Health Services. Farla is an Approved Supplier to NHS. We supply over 30,000 products and we have almost 1000 product lines through our GripSense, MediRange, Select, Madamn, MediWipes and MediHands ranges, supplying GP practices, Clinics and Hospitals throughout the UK. POWDER & LATEX FREE Our nitrile disposable gloves do not contain latex or powder to reduce skin irritation and avoid the risk of contamination in sensitive environments. MULTI-INDUSTRY USE These are perfect for Tattooists, Mechanics, Hospitality, and countless other industries where protective gloves must be worn. AMBIDEXTROUS Each glove you find in a pack will be identical, so you can wear them on either hand. Have excellent stretch, making them comfortable to wear for extended periods of time. The beaded cuff provides drip protection for the forearm and increased glove strength, these are a feature on all MediHands gloves. Made to be puncture resistant, MediHands gloves maintain a tough barrier between possible contaminants and your hands.
